name: General Office Cleaning (Daily)
description: Comprehensive daily cleaning for typical office environments, focusing on high-traffic areas and touchpoints.

name: General Office Cleaning (Weekly)
description: Weekly service covering all general areas, suitable for smaller or low-traffic offices.

name: Restroom Sanitization
description: Deep cleaning and sanitization of all restroom facilities, including fixtures, floors, and walls.

name: Breakroom & Kitchen Cleaning
description: Cleaning of all kitchen and breakroom surfaces, appliances (exterior), and food prep areas.

name: Floor Stripping & Waxing (Vinyl)
description: Full stripping and application of multiple coats of high-gloss wax for VCT and vinyl floors.

name: Floor Stripping & Waxing (Linoleum)
description: Specialized process for linoleum flooring to restore original luster and protect surfaces.

name: Carpet Shampooing - Small Area
description: Hot water extraction for targeted small carpeted areas or rugs.

name: Carpet Shampooing - Full Office
description: Complete hot water extraction for all carpeted office areas, removing deep dirt and allergens.

name: Window Cleaning (Interior)
description: Streak-free cleaning of all interior glass and window tracks.

name: Post-Construction Cleanup (Phase 1)
description: Initial rough cleaning after construction is complete, removing debris and large dust piles.

name: Post-Construction Cleanup (Phase 2)
description: Final detailed cleaning, including appliance interiors, fixture polishing, and floor finishing.

name: Deep Clean Disinfection
description: Electrostatic spraying and specialized virucidal treatment for critical areas.

name: Tile and Grout Cleaning
description: High-pressure cleaning to lift embedded dirt from tile and grout lines.

name: Parking Lot Sweeping
description: Removal of debris and trash from commercial parking lots and walkways.

name: Green Cleaning Program
description: Use of eco-friendly, biodegradable, and certified green cleaning products exclusively.
